text: Amr Medhat Warda (; born 17 September 1993) is an Egyptian footballer. He plays for Atromitos on loan from PAOK. He also plays for the Egypt national team. He is an attacking midfielder. On 22 August 2015, Warda signed a three- year contract with Panetolikos F.C. == Honours == === Club === Atromitos * The best player of the Greek league for the 2017-2018 season.Officially: Amr Warda wins the Greek league Player of the Year for the 2017-2018 season. == References == Category:1993 births Category:Egyptian footballers Category:Living people Category:Egypt international footballers
title: Amr Warda
